${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbsolutePower.NAME: Absolute Power
${modID}:AbsolutePower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  every time an attack's damage ends in a 9.

${modID}:AncientStrike.NAME: Ancient Strike
${modID}:AncientStrike.DESCRIPTION: Give the enemy !M! Artifact. Deal !D! damage per Artifact stack.

${modID}:BadMemory.NAME: Bad Memory
${modID}:BadMemory.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a *Freak *Bullet to your hand.

${modID}:BalletShoes.NAME: Ballet Shoes
${modID}:BalletShoes.DESCRIPTION: On odd hand size, NL play the middle card in your hand !M! times and Exhaust it.

${modID}:OLDBurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
${modID}:OLDBurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Burn into your hand.

${modID}:Blooky.NAME: Blooky
${modID}:Blooky.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Your next card this turn is ${modID}:Ghostly.

${modID}:BurntPan.NAME: Burnt Pan
${modID}:BurntPan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Critical: Gain Temp HP equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Convert this card's ${modID}:XP to ${modID}:LV.

${modID}:CriticalStrike.NAME: Critical Strike
${modID}:CriticalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Critical: Deal double damage.

${modID}:DogShrine.NAME: Dog Shrine
${modID}:DogShrine.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! card. NL Draw cards equal to its ${modID}:XP.
${modID}:DogShrine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw cards equal to their ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:DontNeedFriends.NAME: Don't Need Friends
${modID}:DontNeedFriends.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *I'm... to your hand.

${modID}:Duel.NAME: Dual!
${modID}:Duel.DESCRIPTION: Put ALL ${modID}:Strikes from your draw pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Evolve.NAME: Evolve
${modID}:Evolve.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:LV whenever you play a card.

${modID}:Execute.NAME: Execute
${modID}:Execute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give 1 card at random !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP.
${modID}:Execute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give up to 1 card !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:OLDExpertise.NAME: Expertise
${modID}:OLDExpertise.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Critical: Choose a card .
${modID}:OLDExpertise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give up to 1 card !M! ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.NAME: Flurry Of Knives
${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:FreakBullet.NAME: Freak Bullet
${modID}:FreakBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card always has at least !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:FriendsForever.NAME: Friends Forever
${modID}:FriendsForever.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose ${modID}:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:FriendsForever.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose ${modID}:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:GarbageDump.NAME: Garbage Dump
${modID}:GarbageDump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp HP for every ${modID}:Wasted Energy spent.

${modID}:Im.NAME: I'm...
${modID}:Im.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL While in hand, you cannot play Attacks.

${modID}:HugItOff.NAME: Hug It Off
${modID}:HugItOff.DESCRIPTION: Give EVERYONE !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, draw !M! card.
${modID}:HugItOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give EVERYONE !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:LevelUp.NAME: Level Up
${modID}:LevelUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your hand with ${modID}:XP for the rest of combat.
${modID}:LevelUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your deck with ${modID}:XP for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Overcome.NAME: Overcome
${modID}:Overcome.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The next card that fails to play this turn is ${modID}:Persevered.
${modID}:Overcome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next card that fails to play this turn is ${modID}:Persevered.

${modID}:Plead.NAME: Plead
${modID}:Plead.DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to the enemy. NL That enemy deals less damage for their ${modID}:LV this turn.
${modID}:Plead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies deal less damage for their ${modID}:LV this turn.

${modID}:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
${modID}:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wait !${modID}:M2!. NL On ${modID}:expiry, deal !M! damage. NL Deals double damage if the enemy does not intend to attack.

${modID}:RememberBravery.NAME: Remember Bravery
${modID}:RememberBravery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose ${modID}:LV, a random card in your hand gains equivalent ${modID}:XP.
${modID}:RememberBravery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you would lose ${modID}:LV, a random card in your hand gains equivalent ${modID}:XP.

${modID}:RememberKindness.NAME: Remember Kindness
${modID}:RememberKindness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy is buffed, it gains !M! Weak.
${modID}:RememberKindness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy is buffed, it gains !M! Weak. NL Whenever an enemy gains Block, it gains !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:RememberPatience.NAME: Remember Patience
${modID}:RememberPatience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have !${modID}:M2! or more cards in your hand, Retain !M! cards this turn.

${modID}:RewindStrike.NAME: Rewind Strike
${modID}:RewindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Revert the enemy to their previous turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RewindStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Revert the enemy to their previous turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rock.NAME: Rock
${modID}:Rock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card always has at least !M! ${modID}:inherent ${modID}:XP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.NAME: Scales Of Justice
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Gain !M! Temp HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SlackOff.NAME: Slack Off
${modID}:SlackOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card starts with !M! ${modID}:added ${modID}:XP. ${modID}:XP decreases Attack damage for this card.

${modID}:Sleep.NAME: Sleep
${modID}:Sleep.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase the time of ALL ${modID}:Countdowns by !M!. NL Upgrade ALL ${modID}:Countdowns. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Sleep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase the time of ALL ${modID}:Countdowns by !M!. NL Upgrade ALL ${modID}:Countdowns.

${modID}:SnowedInn.NAME: Snowed Inn
${modID}:SnowedInn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp HP. NL Trigger ALL of your ${modID}:Countdowns.

${modID}:Spare.NAME: Spare
${modID}:Spare.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spare the enemy. NL They gain ${modID}:Spared. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Spare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spare the enemy, and gain gold rewards if you flee. NL They gain ${modID}:Spared. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: Steal ALL enemies' Block and buffs.
${modID}:Steal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal ALL enemies' Block and buffs. NL Draw a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Block steal is negated by Artifact)

${modID}:ToAsh.NAME: To Ash
${modID}:ToAsh.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Skill. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:KR.

${modID}:TornNotebook.NAME: Torn Notebook
${modID}:TornNotebook.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you lose HP, gain 1 Buffer. NL ${modID}:Critical: Gain !${modID}:M2! Buffer.

${modID}:Twirl.NAME: Twirl
${modID}:Twirl.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Critical: Retain up to !M! card this turn, NL and upgrade it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:VineBloom.NAME: Vine Bloom
${modID}:VineBloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Give the enemy !M! Thorns.
